function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Coding criteria for positive characteristics, functioning, and emotion are complex and open to subjective interpretation, potentially leading to inconsistent coding and scoring.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliability of the flourishing scale and ess data may be called into question if the operational definitions and coding criteria are unclear or inconsistently applied.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive analysis of
